name: rezizer-url
description: Rezizer URL generator - Building optmized image URLs.
author: Zanaca <zanaca@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run lint && tape test/basic.js | faucet
scripts.test-hashing: npm run lint && tape test/basic.js test/hashing.js | faucet
scripts.test-requests: npm run lint && tape test/basic.js test/requests.js | faucet
scripts.test-full: npm run lint && tape test/basic.js test/hashing.js test/requests.js | faucet
